author: info@scout.com (Staff)
title: 2017 Signing Day announcement schedule
text:
Aubrey Solomon (Photo by Chad Simmons) 2017 National Signing Day announcement schedule Staff 6:35 AM Complete list of announcement times for the most high-profile uncommitted recruits in 2017. 
While most prospects in the Scout 300 have already revealed their school of choice, these high school standouts have held off to announce their decision in the limelight of National Signging Day. Here's a look at who's committing on letter-of-intent day, Feb. 1. Click each player's name for highlight videos and scouting reports. 
All times shown are Eastern and subject to change. 8 a.m. 
4-star OLB Levi Jones (Florida State, Florida, USC) 
4-star OT Stephan Zabié (Texas, Ole Miss, UCLA) 9 a.m. 
4-star S Chaz Ah You (BYU, Washington, UCLA) 
4-star LB Mohamed Sanogo (Ole Miss, Mississippi State, UCLA) 
3-star WR Michael Harley Jr. (Miami, Michigan, UCLA) 9:45 a.m. 
5-star DT Aubrey Solomon (Michigan, Alabama, Georgia, USC) 10 a.m. 
4-star OLB Willie Gay (LSU, Mississippi State, Ole Miss) 
4-star S Todd Harris (LSU, Alabama, TCU, ASU) 
4-star DE Jarez Parks (Alabama, Auburn, Florida, Florida State, North Carolina) 
4-star WR Jeff Thomas (Miami, Louisville, Oregon) 
3-star DE Aaron Sterling (South Carolina, Tennessee, Georgia) 11 a.m. 
4-star CB Chevin Calloway (Arkansas, Texas, Ole Miss) 11:30 a.m. 
4-star DE Markaviest Bryant (Georgia, Auburn, LSU) 
5-star DE Jay Tufele (Utah, BYU, Michigan, Ohio State, USC) 11:35 a.m. 
5-star DE K'Lavon Chaisson (LSU, Texas, USC) 
3-star DT Damion Daniels (Nebraska, Colorado, UTSA) Noon 
4-star TE Josh Falo (Oregon, Colorado, USC) 
4-star CB Christopher Henderson (Alabama, Florida, Miami)

3-star WR Michael Onyemaobi (Nebraska, Iowa State, TCU, UNLV, Washington State) 
3-star ATH Kam White (Ole Miss, Iowa State, Minnesota) 12:40 p.m. 
5-star DE LaBryan Ray (Alabama, Florida, Mississippi State, Ole Miss, Tennessee) 1 p.m. 
3-star RB A.J. Davis (Pitt, North Carolina, Louisville) 
4-star OT Thayer Munford (Ohio State, Kentucky) 
5-star WR Devonta Smith (Alabama, Florida State, LSU, Miami) 2 p.m. 
3-star ATH Jeremiah Owusu-Koramoah (Notre Dame, Michigan State) 
4-star CB Tariq Castro-Fields (Penn State, Maryland) 2:30 p.m. 
4-star WR Nico Collins (Michigan, Georgia, Alabama) 
3-star DE B.J. Thompson (Baylor, Florida State, Utah, Washington State) 
3-star Kofi Wardlow (Notre Dame, Maryland) 4:10 p.m. 
4-star ATH Greg Johnson (USC, Nebraska, Oregon) 
5-star WR Joseph Lewis (USC, Nebraska, Oregon) 4:30 p.m. 
5-star DT Marvin Wilson (LSU, Florida State, Ohio State, Oklahoma, USF) Others expected to commit on Feb. 1, time TBD 
4-star DE Lagaryonn Carson (Baylor, North Texas, Texas A&M)

4-star CB Deommodore Lenoir (Nebraska, Oregon)
